pr_title: Fixed the failure of search nightly CI build

timeline.message: Fixed the failure of aggregate report
Fixed the failure of aggregate report

timeline.bodyText: You'll want to move this into the getBodyAsString overload without parameters, nothing I've found in Azure Core leverages the Charset overload.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: If create succeeded, then you can break out of the do-while loop.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: The management plane does not provide us the status of creation. I have to ping the service to confirm. The newly added code is to avoid failure of creating on already exists account.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: Could we check the status of the SearchService object?
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText:
Just checked over the API. Find the status one this time. Missing from the initial investigation.
Will try to switch to status() checking
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: I have tried the API they provided. Seems not that stable as service ping. In order to make our live tests more stable. I decided to switch back to ping machenism.
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Reverted back as the test has passed
Reverted back as the test has passed

timeline.bodyText: We should add some delay between each retry instead of retrying with no delay.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText:
There is delay of 30 seconds on every .create() operation.
Put it in shouldRetry() helper.
replies.author: sima-zhu
